content.description: You should see a roof.  The route that goes directly through the roof is Charlei Don't Surf.  On the left side of the roof, you should see two bolt lines that share the first and last bolts.  This is the left of those two lines.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus 2 bolts for the chains.
content.location: Of the five routes, this is dead in the middle.

content.description: On the right side of the arete that saphire eyes is on.
content.protection: 5 bolts plus two bolts for chains. 3rd anchor bolt is new to supplement the two cold-shuts.
content.location: Of the five routes, this is second from the right.

content.description: Climb on the left side of the arete.
content.protection: 4 bolts plus 2 bolts for chains at top. 3rd anchor bolt is new to supplement the two cold-shuts.
content.location: Of the five routes, this is the farthes left.  Climb over a ledge, then continue up left side of arete.

content.description: You should see a roof.  The route that goes directly through the roof is Charlei Don't Surf.  Shares anchors with Tropic Sun and Honduras Beaches.  You have to traverse left to get to the anchors from the last bolt.
content.location: Of the five routes, this is the farthest right.

content.description: You should see a roof.  The route that goes directly through the roof is Charlei Don't Surf.  On the left side of the roof, you should see two bolt lines that share the first and last bolts.  This is the right line of those two lines
content.protection: 4 bolts plus 2 bolts for the chains.
content.location: Of the five routes, this is 2'nd from the right.

content.description: Cool free standing pillar.  Crux is at the top.
content.protection: 3 bolts and chains at the top.
content.location: You will probably run into this tower on your approach to the "upper wall" of contra canyon towers.  It's at about the same elevation on the hill as the Upper Wall, and about 200 yards North.

content.description: South facing wall with six routes total, also called Contra Canyon Spires in John Jackson's North Tahoe guide.
